channel.title: Jesse Plemons on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jesse Plemons on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kirsten Dunst Shares Update on Her Son After His “Serious Health Scare” While She Was Filming Overseas
item.description: The actress didn’t disclose the specifics but compared it to “‘Final Destination,’ where you’re imagining all the things that could go wrong, worst-case scenarios happening to your child.”
